weather_report:
Under a gently shifting veil of clouds, Downtown San Francisco finds itself cradled in a cool embrace, the night yielding to a morning that promises a blend of sun and shadows. With the temperature settling around a crisp 46 degrees, there’s an invitation to bundle up a bit tighter, perhaps wrapping yourself in a snug sweater or light jacket to ward off the chill. As the day unfolds, the promise of partly sunny skies makes its entrance, peeking through the layers, while gentle winds whisper at a calm 2 to 7 mph from the west. 

As you glance at the horizon, the city appears both hazy and welcoming, with the marine layer still lingering along the coasts—ghostly tendrils possibly clinging to the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, softening its silhouette against the backdrop. The high today will flirt with 55 degrees before retreating to a more comfortable 52 in the afternoon, making it a day well-suited for a leisurely stroll through the quieter streets or perhaps a stop at a cozy café to savor the warmth of a freshly brewed coffee. While the fog hangs in quiet moments, it also invites a sense of calm, presenting a perfect backdrop for reflection or unhurried conversations with friends. Embrace the understated beauty of the day; the city has secrets to share if you’re willing to wander.
